class.name: VideoStreamMKV
class.brief_description: Hardware-accelerated MKV video stream resource with AV1 decoding using Vulkan Video API.
class.description:
[VideoStreamMKV] is a specialized video stream resource for playing AV1-encoded video files in MKV/WebM containers with Opus audio. This implementation uses the Vulkan Video API for hardware-accelerated AV1 decoding, providing high-performance video playback on compatible GPUs.
The module is self-contained with embedded libsimplewebm for container parsing and libopus for audio decoding, eliminating external dependencies.
[b]Hardware Requirements:[/b] - GPU with AV1 hardware decoding support (NVIDIA RTX 30+, AMD RX 6000+, Intel Arc) - Recent drivers with Vulkan Video extensions - Vulkan Video API extensions: VK_KHR_video_queue, VK_KHR_video_decode_av1
[b]Supported Formats:[/b] - Video: AV1 codec only (hardware-accelerated) - Audio: Opus only - Container: MKV and WebM only
[b]Note:[/b] This is a hardware-focused implementation optimized for AV1 content. For broader codec support with software fallback, consider using other video stream classes.
